mapper.select: SELECT board_id, user_id as writer,title,content,reg_date,likes,hits FROM board as b join member as m on b.user_key=m.user_key where board_id >=#{boardId}-1 and board_id <=#{boardId}+1;
SELECT * from board where board_id <#{boardId} order by board_id desc limit 1
SELECT * from board where board_id >#{boardId} limit 1
select * from board order by board_id desc limit #{firstRow}, #{boardCntPerPage}
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
update board set comment_count=comment_count+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
update board set comment_count=comment_count-1 where board_id=#{boardId}
update comment set comment=#{comment} where comment_id=#{commentId}
update board set likes=likes+1 where board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.select: select likes from board where board_id=#{boardId}
select count(*) from boardlikes where board_id=#{boardId} and user_key=#{userKey}
mapper.update: update board set likes=likes-1 where board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.delete: delete from boardlikes where board_id=#{boardId} and user_key=#{userKey}
